name: AntonCUBE
description:
AntonCUBE is a cubic puzzle game based on Summitsphere's award-winning video game franchise Antonball. Anton (or Annie) will need your help to find their balls across seven levels of brick-kicking action!

Controls:
  • Keyboard: Left/Right arrow keys to move
  • Controller: Left/Right analog stick direction

 2020 JetCF2. Antonball characters and music  2019-2020 Summitsphere.
